sections.title: Spherewalker (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Spherewalker class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Landmark (Su) (Spherewalker)
sections.description: Creates mental landmarks that provide directional awareness and improve teleportation familiarity, functioning as a scrying effect that can be shared with other spherewalkers.

sections.title: Longstrider (Sp) (Spherewalker)
sections.description: Grants the ability to use the longstrider spell once per day with caster level equal to character level.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Spherewalker)
sections.description: Advances spellcasting progression of an existing class, or grants domain spell slots based on Wisdom if no spellcasting class exists.

sections.title: Efficient Sleep (Su) (Spherewalker)
sections.description: Provides a +4 sacred bonus against sleep effects and reduces required rest time from 8 hours to 4 hours.

sections.title: Star Slinger (Ex) (Spherewalker)
sections.description: Grants any starknife used in combat the returning weapon property without providing additional enhancement bonuses.

sections.title: Dream Link (Sp) (Spherewalker)
sections.description: Creates a permanent telepathic bond with a willing creature after sleeping near them for 4 hours, causing stunning effects if the link partner dies.

sections.title: Divine Luck (Su) (Spherewalker)
sections.description: Adds a luck bonus equal to class level to attack rolls, skill checks, or saving throws after rolling but before knowing the result.

sections.title: Swarm Form (Su) (Spherewalker)
sections.description: Transforms into a swarm of butterflies with flight, nauseating aura, immunity to weapon damage, but vulnerability to fire and energy weapon effects.
